title: Butter Knife, 1913
markings: On one side of the blade; one C. H or G.H in a rectangular mark , plus London leopard head, sterling lion passant, and date letter s for 1913
provenance: 2013, Given to Cooper-Hewitt by owner Harry C. Sigman
description: Ivory handle and silver blade, joined by a silver band including four chrysoprase stones.

tombstone.epitaph: Butter Knife, 1913.Silver, ivory, chrysoprase. Gift of Harry C. Sigman. 2013-21-11.
